metadata.name: Invoke-Obfuscation COMPRESS OBFUSCATION - System
metadata.comment: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via COMPRESS OBFUSCATION

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(metadata.log_provider) = lower('service control manager') AND metadata.event_code = 7045 AND contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('new-object')) AND contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('text.encoding]::ascii')) AND contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('readtoend')) AND (contains(lower(process.file.path), lower(':system.io.compression.deflatestream')) OR contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('system.io.streamreader'))))

output.summary: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via COMPRESS OBFUSCATION
